full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
=====================================

*   **Contract Reference Number:** WS4063256226-Doc4310363684
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-11-15
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-12T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** 2023-11-23 (Amendment 1)

**Supply Requirements**
-------------------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking a supplier to provide two (2) military shipping containers to the Department of National Defence, including delivery in Alouette, QC, Canada. The solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation Doc4063277998, dated August 9, 2023, with a closing date of September 7, 2023.

**Contract Details**
--------------------

*   **Estimated Contract Date:** August 31, 2023 (starting date)
*   **Expected Delivery Location:** Alouette, QC, Canada
*   **Quantity:** Two (2) military shipping containers
*   **UNSPSC Codes:** 24112400, 24112800, 24112900 (Storage chests and cabinets and trunks, Freight containers, Crates)
*   **Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to bidders qualifying under various Canadian Free Trade Agreements, including the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement and the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement.

**Evaluation Criteria**
-----------------------

Offers will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Point of Contact:** Martineau, Francois S (francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18017498?extsite=MTgwMTc0OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18017498?extsite=MTgwMTc0OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Note**
--------

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to offerors who have submitted an offer in response to the previous solicitation.
